## Responses by department

```{r echo=FALSE, warnings=FALSE}

library(magrittr)

department_table <- data.frame(table(departments))

plot <- plot_freqs(department_table, xlab = "Number of respondents", ylab = "Department", n = sum(department_table[2]), font_size = 14, height = 400 + 50 * nrow(department_table))

table <- kableExtra::kable_styling(knitr::kable(department_table)) %>% 
  kableExtra::add_footnote(paste0("Sample size = ", sum(department_table[2]))) 

carsurvey2::wrap_outputs("coding-freq", plot, table)

```
